title: Turbo Scrub As Seen On TV Commercial
description: The cordless, hand held power scrubber that takes the work out of cleaning.

asset.author: As Seen On TV
asset.description:
Buy direct from As Seen On TV, Inc. http://astv.tv/pv6f
The cordless, hand held power scrubber that takes the work out of cleaning.

transcripts: Is your bathroom and disaster tired of scrubbing and breaking your back to clean that mess. hi Anthony Sullivan here and this is the turbo scrub the cordless rechargeable power scrubber that tackles even the toughest messes quick and easy look how it makes this old tile look like new turbo scrub is tough enough to break down caked on messes for a deep clean on any surface use it in the shower for hard water stains calcium lime rust and build up nothing better than the turbo scrub for tough areas like the bathroom sink watch the brush conform to fixtures and fittings for re around the tub use the turbo scrub with the extension one you never bang your back and it spins it over 300 RPM making tough jobs like this quick and easy to scrub up high or clean down low turbo scrubs the way to go it's perfect to cut through a grungy grout on tile walls and shower stalls just scrub and rinse with the comb brush turbo scrub easily cleans those hard-to-reach areas like shower door jams its angle bristles are perfect for getting into tough hard to clean corners if you ain't cleaning the toilet get a turbo scrub it does the dirty work so you don't have to in the kitchen easily clean cook top stoves or metal grates it cleans everything and the kitchen sink it's perfect for scrubbing grime out of sliding glass door tracks and tackles Road grime from your rims with ease call or click now.
